title: Normal Draft Pick for Oceania
body:
Can we introduce a normal draft pick to the oceania server? 
if not why not

replies.body:
I recently moved from the UK to AUS - to find that there is NO draft normals for OCE just utterly amazes me.
Hope to see a trial Draft Normal soon as i'm sure there will be enough people for it.

If not, then thats a huge Dev mistake in my opinion, huge letdown. (not to mention the lost community members...)

I used to live in Australia and never realised just how lacking game types there were until I moved back to England!
And now I'm moving back and having no Normal Draft really bums me out. :(
I can't understand why they don't have it?!

Because we do not have enough players yet oce is still pretty small. The reason we don't have as many game modes is because the servers want us to focus more on normal and ranked so that que times won't take that long. It is to balance out the times for the ques if we had all the game modes that NA has then our que wait times could be 3-5 mins which could be annoying. We still have really less so when have a lot more players then we can have more modes. Right now it is for balance.

>Because we do not have enough players yet oce is still pretty small.

Can people quit using this excuse?

It was a lie when they removed draft, the reason they removed draft was for TB, and TB is failing harder then Draft ever did yet still stands.
Why does riot want us to play tb so bad?

To prove that they haven't failed in building a system, which they fucked up right at the start, and has made no one actually want to play it at all.

Fact is it might be a working system, but no one cares cause they started it as shit and no one has the patience to try it because queue times are 20+ minutes for anyone not in bronze elo, yet draft was dropped for a "similar" problem of 10+ minute queues outside of gold-Plat (and even then it wasn't that bad)

EDIT: As a note, i mean for anyone higher then gold and plat you were looking at 10+ minute queue's.
I'm also coming from LAS to OCE to find out there's no Normal Draft Pick. This is just too bad. I really liked Draft pick for normals. I hope they add it soon. {{champion:32}}
Remove normals keep teambuilder for the plebs who love it and bring back draft to ready plebs for the ranked experience.
